Pre-Game Insights: India will be touring Sri Lanka on the back of their Historic T20 World Cup championship win last month.
The series will mark the first time both teams will play under their new coaches, Gautam Gambhir for India and Sanath Jayasuriya for Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wonder Cement, announced today that they would be the title sponsor for Indiaâ€™s Tour of Sri Lanka beginning July 27, 2024.
Others: The series will start off with T20Is on July 27 at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, while the ODIs start on August 2 at R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
Wonder Cement will be looking to build brand awareness and recall through multiple activations during the series and engage with cricket audiences.
